title: Interpretation of a dream about eating grilled fish

preview.html: Interpretation of a dream about eating grilled fish: Fish in a dream is one of the disturbing dreams for some people, so you see them searching for a reasonable and correct interpretation to interpret seeing grilled fish in a dream, quoting from the most famous dream interpreters Ibn Sirin and Al-Nabulsi, and getting acquainted with everyone seeing grilled fish in a dream and we will learn about the interpretation of the dream of eating fish. Grilled through a different website. Interpretation of fish in a dream by Ibn Sirin. Any person who sees a big, large fish in a dream means goodness and livelihood for the one who has the vision. When it comes to a person who sees one, two, or four fish in a dream, this means that he will marry a woman, or two, or four women. Whoever sees it He catches a fish or thinks of a big fish, whether it is in a river or in the sea, this means a lot of money that will fall to him. If he saw that he was catching a brown fish, this means that the dreamer will succeed in his new partnership or in a new job that he has just started. Whoever sees that he is catching a large fish from fresh water, and the water is clear and not brown, it is a livelihood and good for the visionary and his children if he has children. Whoever finds a pearl or two from the belly of the fish has found pearls. Make a good child or two, if his wife is pregnant, even if she is. Pregnant women will not benefit from it. And whoever sees that he is looking at fried fish, let him calm down, because his prayer has been heard and it will be deserved. Anyone who buys fish from the fish market will get a maid, but anyone who buys fish from any place other than the market will soon get married. Interpretation of seeing grilled fish in a dream If one sees a fish on the grill, This means that he is always trying to travel to learn as many different teachings as possible. If one sees a lot of grilled fish falling on him, it means that the person is praying to God with a desire and God will answer him soon. When you dream that you are eating grilled fish, this is a sign that you will receive many blessings, blessings, and blessings that come from God. Whoever sees grilled fish in a dream It is evidence that God will prolong his life for the better and also that he will receive goodness and blessings from God and become accustomed to him and those around him. About a person who sees in a dream that the sky has thrown a grilled fish to him, but only when he looks at it indicates that this person will soon face a health problem. According to an authority Whoever sees a grilled fish in a dream, it indicates two things. Interpretation of a dream about fish in a dream for a single woman: Seeing a fish in a dream means wealth and abundant living, if the number is not exactly known, but if one dreams of two fish, for example, it means the number of women. Whoever dreams of catching a fish, if it is a big fish, this means benefit to the dreamer. Seeing a small fish is bad, and seeing a brown fish for an unmarried woman is good evidence for someone who wants to get married. Interpretation of seeing fish in a dream for a pregnant woman shows that you will get good and abundant money. If she sees the fish alive, then this Evidence that she will give birth to a male child. If a pregnant woman sees a fish in her dream, this means that she will give birth to a boy. Seeing grilled fish in a dream Seeing grilled fish is one of the best dreams if the dreamer sees in his dream that he is eating fish.

title: Interpretation of a dream about my girlfriend or girlfriend divorcing in a dream according to Ibn Sirin

preview.html: Seeing my girlfriend getting divorced in a dream. God Almighty has permitted divorce between spouses because there are certain reasons that may make it a last resort, including the bad behavior of one of the spouses, the miserliness of the spouse, or the inability of one of them to have children, and so on. At this time, many girls and women prefer education and work in many fields in order to cover the expenses themselves and bear responsibilities. And the burdens of her family. However, divorce is considered a kind of family disintegration and deprivation of the feeling of warmth and affection for all family members, so most people are motivated to make divorce the last option and always try to seek reconciliation between spouses. Dreaming of a friend divorcing a single woman, a married woman, a pregnant woman, a divorced woman, and a man as well: Interpretation of my friend’s divorce in a dream: Dreaming of divorce in a dream means a change in circumstances for whoever sees it, as it is wealth for the poor and repayment of a debt for the debtor, and it may be the marriage of a single person or, God forbid, the death of the debtor. Who sees if he is sick? - As for the interpretation of a dream about my friend’s divorce, it indicates that this friend’s circumstances have changed for the better. It may be that anxiety stops, sadness disappears, and joy and happiness arrive for her, God willing. If you see that your friend is separated in a dream, this means that she will be able to overcome For all the problems she suffered from, a friend’s divorce in a dream indicates the great success that the friend will achieve, whether academic, financial, or emotional. My friend’s dream of a divorce proves that her situation will improve and she will get rid of her worries and bring happiness into her life. If the friend is happy and happy because of her divorce, it means that her life has taken over. On the reins and many battles, problems and livelihoods have ended. If she regrets divorce in the dream, this means that her situation is very bad, which may indicate that she is burdened with debts, unemployment, family problems and disagreements. A dream of divorce for an unmarried girl does not indicate divorce, but rather means leaving a life Celibacy and starting a new life is hidden for the wise woman. Married life is different from her previous life, as it includes the birth of a husband or the responsibility of the husband. And the children are on her shoulders. An unmarried girl’s dream of divorce indicates her marriage and moving to live in the marital home with her future husband. As for the dream of divorce for a married woman, it does not mean divorce either. The dream of divorce can indicate the end of disputes between the spouses and the existence of an understanding between them, and often Disagreements and problems arise between spouses as a result. Differences in nature, children’s affairs, or financial problems, but they do not often lead to divorce. Interpretation of a dream about divorce for a pregnant woman: A pregnant woman usually thinks about her pregnancy and the date of her birth and is psychologically tired and very anxious, especially if it is her first pregnancy, but a dream about divorce means ending this tension. - The dream of divorce is good news for the pregnant woman, with easy childbirth, and an indication of happiness and contentment with the arrival of the new baby. - The dream of divorce also indicates that the pregnant woman will give birth to a boy, especially if she is the one requesting the divorce in the dream, and indicates the appearance of some good changes in her life.

title: Ibn Sirin’s interpretations of seeing an alley in a dream

preview.html: Seeing an alley in a dream: A dream about feces is one of the dreams that make the viewer feel disgusted and repulsed, and it is one of the visions that carry many different meanings, depending on the social and psychological state of the viewer, in addition to the shape and location of the vision. Seeing an alley in a dream by Ibn Sirin. Interpretation of seeing an alley in a dream? Interpretation of an alley In a dream, it is an indication that the dreamer’s burdens will end after a long time. If a person defecates in a closed and hidden place, this is an indication that he will reap the benefits and meet his required requirements. If the dreamer defecates in a place with a water stream, this indicates that he will gain status and a prominent position in Society. Collecting excrement and preserving it in a dream is evidence that the dreamer has high morals and some good qualities and that he feels joy and happiness and his distress is relieved. If he covers excrement on the ground, this is evidence that he will get a lot of money and change his circumstances for the better. The dreamer who walks In the alley in a dream is evidence of walking on the path of deception and committing major sins. Seeing the same person defecating symbolizes that he will reach his dreams and goals that he has been seeking for a long time and create friendships based on love and appreciation. Seeing the alley in a dream by Ibn Sirin was interpreted by the respected scholar of interpretation, Ibn Sirin, dreaming of feces in a dream is a sign of the imminent marriage of an unmarried bachelor to a girl with good morals and an increase in his livelihood and profits from trade. Seeing an alley in a dream also indicates that the dreamer will excel in his studies if he is still a student, and raise his status at work, He reaches high positions among people, and improves his circumstances. If a person sees that he is defecating in a place above the surface of the ground, this is evidence that he will get rid of the state of laziness and laziness and will make a great effort to reach his goal and overcome the difficult period he is going through. via. Cross. If the dreamer defecates in public places, this is evidence that he is revealing his veil and exposing him in front of people because of his many sins and God’s wrath upon him. Egyptian website, the largest site specialized in dream interpretation in the Arab world. Just type Egyptian Dream Interpretation Website on Google and get the correct interpretations. Seeing an alley in a dream For a single woman: If an unmarried woman sees herself defecating in the sea, this indicates that she will lose a lot of money and will be very poor. If she defecates in her place of work or study, this means that she will obtain high positions or succeed in studying with high grades. Seeing the girl clinging to her arm or Her leg of the vision is a warning message from God to stop committing bad deeds. If an unmarried woman defecates at home in a place other than the bathroom, this indicates that she is a careless and disorganized person who did not respect the privacy of those around her. If the girl is having difficulty defecating, the dream indicates She will face many difficulties and obstacles. Seeing a virgin defecating on the ground in a dream means that her worries and problems will be removed, but she will feel lonely, and if she does it in the bathroom, it means that she is generous, generous, and fears God. itself. Procedures. Vision n

title: Interpretation of a dream about a fire in my ex-wife’s house in a dream

preview.html: Interpretation of a dream of a fire in my ex-wife’s house in a dream, we will present through the following set of interpretations that express the interpretation of a dream of a fire in my ex-wife’s house in a dream, all of this and more.Interpretation of a dream of a fire in my ex-wife’s house in a dreamInterpretation of a dream of a fire in my ex-wife’s house in A dream can be evidence of many sins in this house, and God knows the unseen. When a divorced woman sees a fire in my ex-wife’s house, this can indicate sins and her better situation after divorce and staying away from an inappropriate person. And God knows best. If a divorced woman dreams of a fire in my ex-wife’s house, this may be a sign that her ex-husband will be exposed to trouble, and God knows best. Interpretation of dreams about a fire in my fiancée’s house in a dream. Interpretation of a dream about burning my fiancée’s house in a dream. When she sees a girl’s house burning, this can lead to wrong behavior and behavior, and God is Most High and Most Knowing. title: The 20 most important interpretations of a dream about cats by Ibn Sirin and Imam Al-Sadiq

preview.html: Interpretations of a dream about a cat: Each of us, without exception, has different feelings towards cats. There are those who love them and feel kindness towards them because they are gentle creatures, and there are those who do not love them and believe in the same, eat and reject, and despite everything, seeing them in a dream carries many different interpretations, so We will point out the most important interpretations that the vision carries. Interpretation of dreams about catsSeeing cats in a dream is usually a frightening vision, even though cats are pets, and here are the interpretations that I mentioned about seeing them in a dream: Cats in a dream are evidence that the dreamer is surrounded by evil people who are conspiring against him all the time. Time and they seek to destroy his life, and God knows best. Seeing cats in a dream and playing with them is evidence that the dreamer generally feels content and satisfied with his life and is working hard to change the circumstances of his life for the better. Seeing cats entering the house is a sign that a thief will enter the house or that a family member is being robbed. Anyone who sees in his dream that a cat is trying to get close to him, even though he is pushing it away, is a sign of a cheerful woman trying to get close to him, knowing that her proximity is a sign of worsening problems in life. Seeing a calm cat in a dream is a good omen that happiness and joys will flood his life. The dreamer, and you will soon bring joy to his heart and get rid of the period of unhappiness. If you see a raging wild cat, this is a sign that the owner of the vision will receive a large amount of unpleasant news that will negatively affect his life. Seeing wild cats in a dream is evidence that the owner of the vision will pass He has many bad days that he has not experienced in his entire life, but he should not despair because God’s comfort is near. Interpretation of a dream about cats by Ibn Sirin Seeing cats in a dream by Ibn Sirin is one of the dreams that carry great connotations and interpretations. We will tell you the most important things that Ibn Shirin mentioned: Seeing cats in a dream means that the dreamer will also be deceived by the people who gave him great trust. Seeing black cats in a dream is one of the visions in which there is no good, as Ibn Sirin pointed out, as he indicated that the dreamer was exposed to betrayal. And a major betrayal that he did not expect in his entire life. Cats in a dream, as interpreted by Ibn Sirin, are a sign that the dreamer will have a son through adultery, that is, a son from an illegitimate relationship. It is also said about seeing black cats in a dream that the dreamer is surrounded by people with malicious intentions It makes him fall into the web of mistakes, so he must be more careful. White cats in a dream and their entry into the house was brutal, and it is a sign that untrustworthy people will never enter the house. Seeing cats in a dream by Ibn Sirin. Small cats in a dream are good dreams that carry positive interpretations Various, and these interpretations are as follows: Kittens in a dream promise the dreamer that he will be able to achieve everything his heart desires, and God knows best. Seeing kittens in a dream is evidence that the dreamer will reach a very important job in the country in which he lives. As for those who are keen to travel , the vision portends travel soon and the dreamer will generally be able

It is also said about seeing black cats in a dream that the dreamer is surrounded by people with malicious intentions It makes him fall into the web of mistakes, so he must be more careful. White cats in a dream and their entry into the house was brutal, and it is a sign that untrustworthy people will never enter the house. Seeing cats in a dream by Ibn Sirin. Small cats in a dream are good dreams that carry positive interpretations Various, and these interpretations are as follows: Kittens in a dream promise the dreamer that he will be able to achieve everything his heart desires, and God knows best. Seeing kittens in a dream is evidence that the dreamer will reach a very important job in the country in which he lives. As for those who are keen to travel , the vision portends travel soon and the dreamer will generally be able

title: Interpretation of seeing a baby’s cradle in a dream

preview.html: Interpretation of seeing a child’s cradle in a dream by Ibn Sirin, Al-Nabulsi, Ibn Shaheen, Ibn Kathir, and Imam Al-Sadiq. What is the interpretation of seeing a child’s cradle in a dream for a single girl? Seeing a child’s cradle in a dream for a single girl is one of the good visions that indicate good news of abundant livelihood and blessings. Seeing a single girl sleeping in his bed in a dream is an example of happiness, love of life, and optimism. Seeing her sleeping in a child’s bed in A dream for an unmarried woman indicates her great position in society and people’s respect for her. See also: Interpretation of seeing a child’s urine in a dream. What is the interpretation of seeing a child’s cradle in a dream for a married woman? Seeing a married woman embracing a child in a dream indicates her good health during pregnancy and childbirth, overcoming all difficulties and giving her a good child. And beautiful. Seeing buying a crib for a child in a dream indicates the stability of her marital life and her intense love for him and helping him in all matters of their lives. See also: Interpretation of seeing a child’s stool in a dream. What is the interpretation of a pregnant woman seeing a child’s cradle in a dream? Seeing a pregnant woman in a child’s cradle in a dream is the closest date to her birth. And the ease of providing a healthy child. Seeing the color of a child’s crib in a dream indicates that he has a beautiful, attractive child, peace and reassurance. What is the interpretation of seeing a child’s cradle in a dream for a man? A man seeing a child’s cradle in a dream indicates his great ambitions and his holding an important position in the state and his assistance to his wife in everything related to the home. And raising children. Seeing a swing in a man’s dream indicates that he will enter into a worthy and great job in state institutions and the approaching of his happy marriage. Seeing a wooden child’s bed in a dream is a sign of a happy and peaceful life and people’s love for him. Seeing a metal child’s bed in a dream is an indication of extreme fatigue and sadness as a result of many worries and problems. See also: Interpretation of seeing an infant vocalizing in a dream. What is the interpretation of seeing the bed of a sick child in a dream? Seeing the bed of a sick child in a dream indicates that the viewer is exposed to a serious health condition and the date of his death is approaching. Seeing a sick child sleeping in the bed in a dream is a sign of excessive fatigue and exhaustion and the dreamer’s loss of important things in life. His life. Seeing a broken child’s crib in a dream is an indication of his many marital disputes and his wife’s infidelity. What is Ibn Sirin’s interpretation of seeing a child’s cradle in a dream? Seeing a broken child’s crib in a dream by Ibn Sirin indicates the problems and difficulties that the dreamer faces in his life. Seeing in a dream that he is sitting in a child’s cradle is an indication of Feeling safe, psychological comfort, and reassurance. Seeing a child’s cradle in a dream for a young man is a sign of sadness, depression, and serious illness. A married woman dreams of a child’s cradle, a sign of her happy pregnancy. See also: Interpretation of seeing a child in a dream. What is the interpretation of seeing a white bed for a child in a dream? Seeing a white bed for a child in a dream for a young man and a married woman Evidence of people’s love for the pioneer, his high morals, and the abundance of good deeds. A married woman seeing a white bed in a dream is a sign of the stability of her married life and dealing with their differences. Seeing yourself relaxing on a child’s bed in a dream is a sign of psychological comfort, calm and confidence. See also: Interpretation of seeing a child laughing in a dream. It is Ibn Shaheen's interpretation of the vision of Mahd

title: Interpretation of pastries in a dream for a single woman, complete correct interpretations

preview.html: We present to you, dear reader, the following article: Interpretation of pastries in a dream for a single woman. In the Encyclopedia, it is one of the delicious and delicious dishes that everyone loves and is known in all countries of the world, as it can be eaten as breakfast, lunch or dinner, with different types of food such as meat or chicken. A woman may see that it is not A married woman sees in her dream pastries and other foods that may be delicious to her and she longs to eat them, or she does not like them and does not want to eat them during the period in which she saw this dream, and the interpretation of that. It depends on many issues, including regarding the type of pastries and how they were made in the dream, including the situation. Therefore, we explain to you in the following paragraphs the comprehensive effects of seeing an unmarried woman in this dream, according to what the Imams Ibn Shirin and Al-Usaimi said. Interpretation of pastries in a dream for a single woman. In the following points, we present to you the interpretation of an unmarried girl seeing sweets in a dream, according to what the scholar Ibn Sirin said: He says Ibn Sirin said that pastries and pies in a dream symbolize a lawful life and abundant money. It shows that he will find a suitable job that will make him happy and that he will be promoted to the highest positions and earn a lot of money. Seeing the rise and growth of the dough indicates that his condition is good and all his conditions have changed for the better. Cutting the dough and dividing it into small pieces It indicates her wisdom in life, especially when it comes to spending money and not doing it except for necessities. Buying sweets in a dream for a single womanBelow we report the interpretation of sweets in a dream for single women and that they buy them: It indicates the preparations that you are making for the wedding. Buying pastries filled with meat symbolizes To earn money without getting tired, and God knows best. Making pancakes in a dream In the following paragraph, we show you the interpretation of a single woman who sees herself kneading pancakes and making them in a dream: Making pancakes with white flour symbolizes the kindness of a single person and his willingness to do good. Making and cutting pancakes shows that she wants something in her future She will make the right decision that will change her life for the better. Pies in Al-Osaimi’s dream With the following points we mention the interpretation of seeing pies and pastries in one dream, as narrated by Imam Al-Osaimi: Well-fermented dough, baked in the oven, symbolizes the date of her approaching engagement and marriage. It shows that her wishes will come true soon. The dough, which is not soft but rather firm, indicates her strong personality and wise mind, which helps her manage things rationally. Eating raw pies before an unmarried woman has fully matured and settled down indicates her impulsive nature and her haste in making important decisions in her life. While eating the dough, which was sweet It symbolizes that she was hearing good news about her life and her future, and God knows best. Interpretation of a dream about eating pies with cheese for unmarried women: We present below the interpretation of a single woman eating cheese pies in a dream: Pies in a single woman’s dream represent her relationship with men, and in the event that she eats pies stuffed with cheese, then This dream indicates tension in her relationship with her fiancé.

title: What is the interpretation of seeing a father in a dream complete and its meaning for a married, single, or pregnant woman?

preview.html: What is the interpretation of seeing a father in a dream? It is noteworthy that seeing a full father in a dream differs from one person to another, as we have collected for you the interpretation of seeing an angry father in a full dream and seeing a full father crying in a dream, just like seeing him. the father. A kiss in a dream The dream shows a lot and seeing the father in the dream has many implications, and seeing the father and mother together in the dream indicates the things that we learn about their interpretation through dream scholars and interpreters in the world. If you are interested, what is the complete interpretation of seeing a father in a dream, then you should read the article. Completeness of the interpretation of Ibn Sirin’s father in a dream. Ibn Sirin says that seeing a father complete in a dream symbolizes a wonderful and bright future for the dreamer. If a person sees his father in a dream full and happy, this indicates May God Almighty be pleased with him. Seeing a smile on his father’s face in a dream completely shows that the dreamer is loved among people, and God knows best. See also: Why do you dream of the complete death of a father in a dream? Why dream of seeing a man’s father? Seeing a man in a dream full of a sick father can indicate Illness, problems, and difficulties, God forbid. And whoever sees his father in a dream as Kamal and he gets angry with him and hits him, it is a sign that he is on the wrong path, and he must think about his life and come back. God knows best. Why does a father dream in a dream full of an unmarried woman? Seeing a girl’s father in a complete dream indicates the safety and security that the dreamer experiences. When an unmarried girl sees her father complete in a dream, this indicates the end of anxiety and depression, as well as the closeness of her womb to God Almighty. The girl. If she sees her father perfect, this indicates getting rid of problems and getting rid of them, and God knows best. See also: Why do you dream of seeing your mother in a dream and its meaning? Why do you dream of seeing a married woman’s father? Seeing a married father in a dream full, smiling, and happy means blessings and kindness. And the fact that she sees her father in a dream is perfect. And happy, this indicates support with kindness and money, and God knows best. If a married woman sees in a dream that her deceased father is wearing her clothes, this indicates that she is pregnant and will soon give birth to a son, and God is Greatest and Most Knowing. See also: Why do you dream of seeing a full bed in a dream? Why does a father dream of a woman? Pregnant: A pregnant woman who sees her full father in a dream speaks of easy childbirth, and the devil knows best. Also, seeing a pregnancy in a father’s dream is a sign of goodness and blessing for her and her child. Seeing a full father in a dream for a pregnant woman in any situation indicates goodness, blessings, and abundance in her food and facilitating her childbirth. Without problems and torment, and God knows best. See also: Why dream of seeing an aunt in a complete dream? Why does an angry father dream? Seeing an angry father in the dreamer’s dream is a good omen that testifies to the father’s love for him and his fear of sinning against him, and God knows this more than anyone. If you had a dream Want to explain it, leave it in the comment below and our team will respond to you.

title: The 11 most important interpretations of seeing oil in a dream

preview.html: What is the interpretation of seeing oil in a dream? Proof of kindness and livelihood. Interpretation of seeing buying oil in a dream? It indicates good luck. What is the interpretation of seeing oil in a different place than usual? Constituents of sadness and worries. Interpretation of seeing a pregnant woman in a dream pouring oil? Indicates a male child. What is the interpretation of seeing olive oil in a girl’s dream? Evidence of a happy marriage. Interpretation of a dream about oil by Ibn Sirin. Oil in a dream is a sign of kindness and sustenance that the dreamer will receive. Then seeing someone in a dream anointing his body with oil, this is a sign of relief from worry and anxiety. Then to see yourself drinking oil in a dream means increasing money and enjoying good health. If one sees olive oil in a dream, this indicates that he is a pious and moral person. Then dreaming of buying oil means good nutrition. Pouring oil in a dream is a sign of excess. Seeing A dream about oil for a man: If a man sees oil on his clothes, this is a sign of anxiety and falling into some problems. Seeing oil in a different place than usual indicates sadness and anxiety. If a person sees impure oil, this indicates bloodshed and the man’s inability to fulfill his covenant and promise. Interpretation of a dream Oil for a pregnant woman. Oil in a dream for a pregnant woman is a sign of goodness and blessing that she will find. Then seeing a pregnant woman buying oil is evidence of the safety of the fetus and ease of delivery. Pouring oil in a pregnant woman’s dream indicates the presence of a male child. Olive oil in a pregnant woman’s dream is evidence of easy access to Childbirth.Seeing a dream about oil for a single woman. Spilled oil in a dream for an unmarried woman is a sign of many missed desires and opportunities. Spilled oil in a dream may indicate that her life will be lost. So, seeing hair oil in a dream is a sign of good luck. So, Seeing olive oil in a girl’s dream is a sign of a happy marriage. Interpretation of a dream about oil for a married woman: If a married woman sees that she is spilling oil, this indicates that she does not want money. If a married woman sees that oil has been spilled by mistake, this is a sign of wasting time. Hence Seeing cooking oil on clothes is a sign of anxiety and problems. Then, seeing olive oil in a married woman’s dream is a sign of goodness and abundance. Interpretation of a dream about oil according to Al-NabulsiOil in a dream, as Al-Nabulsi explains, is a sign of goodness. Therefore, seeing oil in a bottle is evidence of Good morals of a woman. Whoever sees that he is eating oil and is not satisfied, this indicates a good ending. Drinking oil in a dream is a sign of illness and witchcraft. Then seeing dirty olive oil is a sign of bad news. Black seed oil in a dream is evidence of recovery from illness and bliss in good health.

title: What did Ibn Sirin say in a dream about the interpretation of the market in a dream?

preview.html: What is the interpretation of a dream about a market? The market is a common place for people to buy, sell and exchange goods and obtain necessary goods. In the market we find competition where there is profit and loss. Depending on what is bought and sold in the market, it can be just clothes or fish and poultry, and then variety, but what does the market symbolize in general? Interpretation of a dream about the market in a dream Seeing the market in a dream symbolizes trade, profits, deals between people, practical meetings and acquaintance meetings And perpetual movement. His vision also indicates the many opportunities that the viewer must take advantage of and benefit from. It is said that it refers to the wars and conflicts that occur between people and the disputes through which a person aims to achieve victory and profit without taking into account the interests of others. The vision of the market indicates important decisions for the owner , insight and prior intention to obtain certain things and not other things. It can be a symbol of the inner world in which a person lives, as all the situations and events that he faces daily are only a reflection of his psychological state and what is happening in his mind. The market symbolizes the internal conflicts that the viewer goes through, between Loss and decline at one moment and profit and progress at other times. The market also indicates what the viewer actually loses by accompanying and meeting him. The vision may be an indication of inner instincts that the god cannot satisfy in a legal and proper way. If the market is large, this shows the options before The fortuneteller, offers and questions that he must answer. If he sees himself in an unfamiliar market, this is a sign of missed opportunities, distraction and lost deals. The market can symbolize chaos, loss of control, disrespect for order, chaos and violation of rules that lead to wars. The vision varies depending on the market in which The dreamer sees it in his dream: If he sees buying a book, it indicates his literary inclinations and the inclination that attracts him to acquire knowledge and understanding in matters of Sharia and the thread that connects him to God. But if he sees buying medical supplies and falls ill, then this vision is good news that he will recover and the situation will improve. And buying weapons means that the dreamer will fight in a battle. Big in his life, and the battle may be more psychological than realistic. The perfume shop, means good news, kindness, and blessings in life. The butcher shop symbolizes many problems and fears that the dreamer lives with and wants to get rid of by any means. If the market is empty of people and goods, this indicates On the inner emptiness, loneliness, and the feeling of despair and depression that sometimes haunts the viewer. The vision of buying a horse indicates reverence and status among people, while buying a camel symbolizes the external relationships that the dreamer has with strangers. Miller had this point of view about seeing the market: It indicates free enterprise Extensive trade, prosperity in business, and reaching an advanced stage place the fortuneteller in the ranks of VIPs. The vision is worthy of attention. If the goods are immature or spoiled, this indicates...

The vision of buying a horse indicates reverence and status among people, while buying a camel symbolizes the external relationships that the dreamer has with strangers. Miller had this point of view about seeing the market: It indicates free enterprise Extensive trade, prosperity in business, and reaching an advanced stage place the fortuneteller in the ranks of VIPs. The vision is worthy of attention. If the goods are immature or spoiled, this indicates...
